mapper.select: SELECT product_id, name, description, use_yn, price, category_id, create_date, modify_date FROM product WHERE product_id=#{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( name, description, use_yn, price, category_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{description}, #{useYn}, #{price}, #{categoryId} );
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, use_yn = #{useYn}, price = #{price}, category_id = #{categoryId}, modify_date = NOW() WHERE product_id = #{productId};
